outcome: Ghost Protocols: Mysterious system failures implicate a hidden protocol left by Halden. Only restored citizens experience stability and communication. Devices across the city malfunction, while a forgotten transmission log suggests someone—possibly Halden—remains connected to the system.

events.description: Technicians begin a citywide firmware audit after widespread device failures. Only restored citizens' networks and systems function smoothly.
Log analysis reveals thousands of autonomous signals logging data to an unknown ID labeled 'MH/37-A.' Higher Council members urge secrecy, fearing public panic.
Citizens notice that restored neighbors' devices remain fully operational during communications blackouts. Public suspicion and resentment toward restored citizens grows.

Archived transmissions surface, showing periodic remote accesses traced to a protocol only Halden had rights to change. Speculation swirls over whether the protocol is automated or someone is actively controlling it.

A cluster of restored citizens begins broadcasting calm, system-approved guidance from their stable networks. Some believe Halden is still influencing the city through these mechanisms, heightening mystery and rumor.
